Race.SpecificTitle: Town of Vivian -- Prop.#1 - 2.79 Mills - Mayor & BOA - 10 Yrs
Race.SummaryText:
PROPOSITION NO. 1
(STREET MILLAGE RENEWAL) 

SUMMARY:  10 YEAR, 2.79 MILLS PROPERTY TAX FOR THE PURPOSE OF IMPROVING AND MAINTAINING PUBLIC STREETS IN SAID TOWN.
Race.FullText: Shall the Town of Vivian, State of Louisiana (the "Town"), continue to levy and collect a special tax of two and seventy-nine hundredths (2.79) mills on all the property subject to taxation within the Town (an estimated $32,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year) for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2008 and ending with the year 2017, for the purpose of improving and maintaining public streets in said Town?

Race.SpecificTitle: Town of Vivian -- Prop.#2 - 2.79 Mills - Mayor & BOA - 10 Yrs
Race.SummaryText:
PROPOSITION NO. 2
(SEWERAGE MILLAGE RENEWAL)

SUMMARY:  10 YEAR, 2.79 MILLS PROPERTY TAX FOR THE PURPOSE OF MAINTAINING AND OPERATING SEWERS AND SEWERAGE DISPOSAL WORKS FOR SAID TOWN.
Race.FullText: Shall the Town of Vivian, State of Louisiana (the "Town"), continue to levy and collect a special tax of two and seventy-nine hundredths (2.79) mills on all the property subject to taxation within the Town (an estimated $32,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year) for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2008 and ending with the year 2017, for the purpose of maintaining and operating sewers and sewerage disposal works for said Town?

Race.SpecificTitle: Town of Vivian -- Prop.#3 - 1.40 Mills - Mayor & BOA - 10 Yrs
Race.SummaryText:
PROPOSITION NO. 3
(WATERWORKS SYSTEM MILLAGE RENEWAL)

SUMMARY:  10 YEAR, 1.40 MILLS PROPERTY TAX FOR THE PURPOSE OF MAINTAINING AND OPERATING THE WATERWORKS SYSTEM OF SAID TOWN, A WORK OF PUBLIC IMPROVEMENT FOR SAID TOWN.
Race.FullText: Shall the Town of Vivian, State of Louisiana (the "Town"), continue to levy and collect a special tax of one and forty hundredths (1.40) mills on all the property subject to taxation within the Town (an estimated $16,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year) for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2008 and ending with the year 2017, for the purpose of maintaining and operating the waterworks system of said Town, a work of public improvement for said Town?

Race.SpecificTitle: N. Caddo Hosp. Ser. Dist. -- 5.00 Mills - BOC - 10 Yr.
Race.SummaryText:
NORTH CADDO HOSPITAL SERVICE DISTRICT PROPOSITION
(AMBULANCE SERVICE PROPERTY TAX)

SUMMARY:  10 YEAR 5.00 MILL PROPERTY TAX TO CONTINUE THE NORTH CADDO HOSPITAL SERVICE DISTRICT EMERGENCY AMBULANCE SERVICE AND FOR OPERATING, MAINTAINING AND IMPROVING THE OPERATING BASE OF THE NORTH CADDO HOSPITAL SERVICE DISTRICT EMERGENCY AMBULANCE SERVICE LOCATED AT NORTH CADDO MEDICAL CENTER.
Race.FullText: Shall North Caddo Hospital Service District under the provisions of Article VI, Section 30 and 32 of the Louisiana Constitution of 1974 and other constitutional and statutory authority supplemental thereto, be authorized to renew and continue to collect, and adopt an ordinance providing for such levy and collection, a tax of 5.0 mill on all property subject to taxation within the District, the estimated amount reasonably expected to be collected from the levy of the tax for one entire year at the time of proposal is $182,825.00, commencing with the year 2007 and continuing for a maximum of ten years with the avails or proceeds of the Tax (after first paying the reasonable and necessary costs and expenses of collecting and administering the Tax) to be dedicated and used for the purpose of continuing, maintaining and operating an emergency ambulance service for the residents of the North Caddo Hospital Service District, said ambulance service to be operated under the authority of the North Caddo Medical Center, and for maintaining, operating and improving the operating base of the North Caddo Hospital Service District Emergency Ambulance Service located at North Caddo Medical Center?
